sentences.sContent: Women do quite commonly fantasise being raped.
sentences.sContent_eng: Women do quite commonly fantasise being raped.
sentences.sCn: 女人确实普遍幻想被强奸。

sentences.sContent: Guys fantasise about sex all the time and one of the best ways to keep them hooked on to you is to indulge their fantasies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Guys fantasise about sex all the time and one of the best ways to keep them hooked on to you is to indulge their fantasies.
sentences.sCn: 他们对于性爱往往充满幻想，让他们可以时时刻刻被你牵着走最好的办法就是，纵容他们。

sentences.sContent: 'Tell me something you fantasise about, ' he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: 'Tell me something you fantasise about, ' he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说：“跟我说一些你的幻想。”

words.tran: 幻想曲；集成曲；幻想作品
幻想家；梦想家；脾气古怪的人
耽于幻想；奏幻想曲（等于phantasy）
